title: Playing Kat, getting stomped by a Zed, begin counterplay/counter build
body:
Gank bot, KS a double. Buy ZH (I almost never buy ZH but it seemed appropriate seeing that I was against a Zed)... I come back into the game, Zed starts bitching about how OP Kat is. 

Bitch, if you had built Hexdrinker instead of rushing BoRK, you would have kept your lead. But nah. You had to stick to one build.
